+:===============+:================================+:==========================================================+
| List shortcuts | <kbd>h</kbd>elp                 | For all keyboard shortcuts (including the examples below) |
+----------------+---------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Jump to        | \                               |                                                           |
|                |                                 |                                                           |

|                |                                 |                                                           |

+----------------+---------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Scroll up\     | <kbd>↑</kbd>\                   |                                                           |
| down           | <kbd>↓</kbd>                    |                                                           |

| Page           | <kbd>f</kbd>orward\             |                                                           |
|                | <kbd>b</kbd>ackward             |                                                           |

| Search         | <kbd>/</kbd> \                  | Activate search mode (then enter your search term)\       |
|                | <kbd>return</kbd>\              | Execute search\                                           |
|                | <kbd>n</kbd>ext\                | Go to next instance\                                      |
|                | <kbd>shift</kbd> + <kbd>n</kbd> | Go to previous instance                                   |
